EmailTemplate.name: FP SG Menu Change - Menu change is live
EmailTemplate.subject: Your menu change has been completed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Partner,
Your menu has now been completed by our content team and is now online (# {!Case.CaseNumber}). To have a look at your menu online, please find the preview link of your menu here and let us know your feedback: {!Case.Menu_URL__c}
If amendments are needed, please send us an email and write the requested changes in the following format:
ITEM NAME - ACTION - INFORMATION Example: Mexican Wings - Change name - Fiery Wings
Any questions? Feel free to contact by submitting the request through form https://foodpandasg.formstack.com/forms/foodpanda_support or via phone at +65 3158 3673.
We are happy to help you!
See you soon, Your foodpanda Partner Care Team
